name: Scorpion Cultist
description: The Scorpion Cultist is a nimble humanoid clad in dark, flowing garments that embody the principles of a sinister cult, ready to serve dark powers.
memorable: Excelled in Dexterity, capable of stealth and dealing poison damage with attacks.
goals: Serve dark powers and enact the will of their sinister cult.
relations: Might be encountered with other cultists or dark entities.
environment: Commonly found in dark, hidden places where they serve their cult.
strengths: High Dexterity and proficient in Stealth, capable of hiding effectively.
weaknesses: Average Strength and social skills, making it less effective in physical confrontations or interactions.
attacks: Scimitar attack deals slashing and poison damage, ranged sling attack also delivers poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Scorpion's Blessing provides advantage against poison and adds poison damage to weapon attacks.
senses: Possesses good passive Perception of 14, enhancing threat detection.
skills: Proficient in Animal Handling, Deception, Perception, and exceptional at Stealth with +5 bonus.
additional_information: Advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.
test_queries: stealthy humanoid cultist with poison attacks
sinister cultist that excels in stealth
cultist skilled in deception and animal handling
